text.text: Energy Metals For A Cleaner World

Canada Silver Cobalt Works Inc. is a dual-focus precious metals and battery metals junior mining company with a valuable portfolio of critical energy metals projects located in some of the safest and environmentally stringent jurisdictions in the world: Northern Ontario and Northern Quebec in Canada.
High-grade Silver: for solar panels and electronics needed in computers and electric vehicles (EVs).
Battery Metals deposits: Nickel and Cobalt for EV batteries and Copper for the extensive wiring needed in EVs and the upgrading of electrical grids.

An environmentally advanced Re-2Ox processing technology --  to convert various mined or recycled metals into nickel and cobalt sulphates needed by EV battery manufacturers -- without any discharge into the air or on the ground, thus satisfying the world's need for clean processing techniques.
